psalm.text:
[[Ps 131,1]]O LORD, my heart is not proud, 
nor are my eyes haughty; 
I busy not myself with great things, 
nor with things too sublime for me.

[[Ps 131,2]]Nay rather, I have stilled and quieted 
my soul like a weaned child. 
Like a weaned child on its mother's lap, 
so is my soul within me.

[[Ps 131,3]]O Israel, hope in the LORD, 
both now and forever.
psalm.title: Psalms

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke

first_reading.text:
[[Ph 2,1]]Brothers and sisters: If there is any encouragement in Christ, any solace in love, any participation in the Spirit, any compassion and mercy,
[[Ph 2,2]]complete my joy by being of the same mind, with the same love, united in heart, thinking one thing.
[[Ph 2,3]]Do nothing out of selfishness or out of vainglory; rather, humbly regard others as more important than yourselves,
[[Ph 2,4]]each looking out not for his own interests, but (also) everyone for those of others.
first_reading.title: Letter to the Philippians
